main event: A family in Jonesville, Louisiana observed flying saucers on 5 November 1950.
interesting points: The objects hovered at an estimated height of 50 feet and emitted twin exhausts similar to jets., The family cook first spotted the saucers and ran to alert the others., Witnesses described the objects as long and round like cigars., The objects seemed to behave unusually, disappearing at great speed without a typical descent., No physical evidence was found from the sightings.
